short_desc: Plans and coordinates services and support for the developmentally disabled and their families in Alameda and Contra Costa counties
description: Plans and coordinates services and support for the developmentally disabled, including people with mental retardation, cerebral palsy, epilepsy, and autism and their families, in Alameda and Contra Costa counties. Establishes diagnosis and plans for individual needs. Assists in referral or purchase of needed services. Provides case management. Coordinates referrals to and discharges from State hospitals. Preventive services include genetic counseling and funding of amniocentesis for high risk mothers.
